issue.title: Organize supported Ubuntu versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2897](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2897). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://arrow.apache.org/install/ doest not describe proper supported Ubuntu versions like https://github.com/red-data-tools/packages.red-data-tools.org#supported-platforms
